Uses of Class
net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource.FactoryResourceConfiguration

  • Packages that use FactoryResourceConfiguration 
    Package Description
    net.proteusframework.internet.http.resource
    Defines a way to describe content by type, size, caching ability and how to retrieve it.
